snippet: Thomas Bach, the president of the International Olympic Committee, said Saturday that he was confident that Russia would enact the necessary antidoping reforms in time for its track and field athletes to be cleared to compete in next year’s...
abstract: International Olympic Committee president Thomas Bach says he is confident that Russia will make necessary anti-doping reforms in time for 2016 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Bach, the president of the International Olympic Committee, said Saturday that he was confident that Russia would enact the necessary antidoping reforms in time for its track and field athletes to be cleared to compete in next year’s Olympics in Rio de Janeiro.
